casebody.data:
Thomas F. ADCOX, Employee
v.
CLARKSON BROTHERS CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, Employer
and
Utica Mutual Insurance Company, Carrier. No. 222P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. R. James Lore, Raleigh, for Adcox, Thomas F. (Employee). Nicholas J. Dombalis, II, Raleigh, for Adcox, Thomas F. (Employee). Kari L. Schultz, Wilmington, for Clarkson Brothers Construction Company, et al. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Clarkson Brothers Construction Company, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 16th of July 2015 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
BEASLEY, J. recused.
